properties.name: profileId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Balance Credit
options.description: Triggered every time a balance account is credited

options.description: Triggered every time a balance account is credited or debited

options.description: Triggered every time a transfer's list of active cases is updated
